content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Mr. Trabelsi. I understand that you are interested in the rental price. I would like to know more about your needs and budget for the apartment. May I know how long you plan on staying in New York and what type of accommodation you require?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I will be staying in New York for 6 months. I need a one bedroom apartment. The apartment should be in a good location with easy access to public transportation. It should be cozy and comfortable. The rental price should be the lowest possible.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your response, Mr. Trabelsi. Based on your requirements, I would like to propose a rental price of €800 per month. This price is competitive in the New York market and should accommodate your needs for a one-bedroom apartment in a good location with easy access to public transportation. I believe this price is reasonable and reflects the value of the apartment. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €800 per month.

Thank you for your help, Mr. Heine. I will be signing the lease agreement soon.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: You're welcome, Mr. Trabelsi. I'm glad that I could assist you in finding a suitable apartment that meets your needs and budget. If you have any questions or concerns during the lease agreement process, please don't hesitate to reach out. I wish you a pleasant stay in New York!
name: Heinrich Heine
